Class GameComponent

java.lang.Object
org.pixel.ext.ecs.GameComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Disposable, org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Updatable, Attachable<GameObject>, org.pixel.graphics.SpriteDrawable
public abstract class GameComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Attachable<GameObject>, org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Updatable, org.pixel.graphics.SpriteDrawable, org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Disposable, java.io.Serializable

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Disables and disposes this game component instance. Notice that if it has a game object parent, it will automatically detach this instance after the current cycle is executed.
      Specified by:
      dispose in interface org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Disposable

    • setEnabled

      public void setEnabled​(boolean enabled)
      Set the active state of this game component. If the game component is disabled, it will not be updated or drawn.
      Parameters:
      enabled - The active state of this game component.
